DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of montelukast with placebo and beclomethasone on the average rate of linear growth over a period of 56 weeks in children with mild asthma.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Boys (aged 6 to 8 years at Visit 1) at Tanner Stage I (prepuberty) Girls (aged 6 to 7 years at Visit 1) at Tanner Stage I (prepuberty With at least a 6month history of asthma with typical symptoms (including, but not limited to cough, wheeze, and shortness of breath, with periodic episodes requiring treatment with inhaled betaagonists) Exclusion Criteria : Patients who used more than 2 courses of inhaled corticosteroids within the 12 months prior to Visit 1
